meanings.definition: The act or process of changing the arrangement or configuration of something.
meanings.sent1: The reconfigurations of the furniture in the living room made it feel like a new space.
meanings.sent2: The company's reconfigurations of its website improved user experience.
meanings.sent3: The reconfigurations of the puzzle pieces were so tricky that it took hours to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her reconfigurations of the garden layout turned it into a colorful paradise.
meanings.sent5: The reconfigurations of the classroom seating arrangement helped students interact better.

meanings.definition: The result of changing the arrangement or configuration of something.
meanings.sent1: After the reconfigurations, the room looked more spacious and organized.
meanings.sent2: The reconfigurations of the software led to faster processing times.
meanings.sent3: The reconfigurations of the recipe ingredients created a surprisingly delicious dish.
meanings.sent4: His reconfigurations of the car engine made it run more efficiently than before.
meanings.sent5: The reconfigurations of the city skyline gave it a modern and dynamic appearance.
